name: Emoji Hunter
description:
I just wanted to learn how to use Gdevelop 5, I think I broke the template I was using, it is an endless shooter. Not sure how to add a score to the game, and I got to fix the game since I broke the template. since you are meant to spend only ten min. on the game not really sure how I am going to have enough time to fix that. however I can fix that title screen for sure that will be easy.
